verses.roman:
rāmadāsa yadi prathama prabhure mililā
mahāprabhu adhika tāṅre kṛpā nā karilā

synonyms: rāmadāsa—the devotee Rāmadāsa Viśvāsa; yadi—when; prathama—for the first time; prabhure mililā—met Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; adhika—much; tāṅre—unto him; kṛpā—mercy; nā karilā—did not show.
translation: When Rāmadāsa Viśvāsa met Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, the Lord did not show him any special mercy, although this was their first meeting.
